price: Yeroo Muusaan ummata isaatiin "dhugumatti, Rabbiin sa’a qaluutti isin ajaja" jedhe [yaadadhaa], [Ummanni isaas] "sila ati qishnaa nu godhattaa?" jedhan, [Muusaanis] "ani warra wallaaloo [namatti qoosan]irraa ta’uu irraa Rabbittin maganfadha" jedhe.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَأۡمُرُكُمۡ أَن تَذۡبَحُواْ بَقَرَةٗۖ قَالُوٓاْ أَتَتَّخِذُنَا هُزُوٗاۖ قَالَ أَعُوذُ بِٱللَّهِ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qāla mūsā liqawmihi inna al-laha yamurukum an tadhbaḥū baqaratan qālū atattakhidhunā huzuwan qāla aʿūdhu bil-lahi an akūna mina al-jāhilīna
